title: Couple with Heart: Person, Man, Medium Light Skin Tone

nouns: Embodies romantic unions and close bonds.

description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with both individuals having a medium-light skin tone. It signifies love, romance, partnership, and affection between two people.
apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving couple with a man of medium-light skin tone, united by a prominent, glossy red heart that floats between them. Apple‚Äôs design language imbues the figures with soft rounded edges and a gentle, illuminated glow, emphasizing their connection and affection. The overall visual tone is one of tenderness and romance, making it an ideal representation of partnership, love, and shared joy in digital communications.
